item.title: Config Overview
item.description: Ship Config The config key is where you can define the dynamic values that end customers need to configure before they can use your application. It might include things like: External Database connection details and credentials Other internal integrations settings like SMTP auth or API keys Tunable settings for your application like “number of worker processes” or “log level” In Replicated Ship, a simple config section with one item might look like
